title:
Hi! My name is Saundnya Sakhare,
I'm a Media Professional based in Las Vegas
description: As a media professional devoted to big concepts and daring stories that drive and champion engagement, I'm constantly fascinated by the level at which people engage with the brands surrounding them. Whether peering through a camera lens or drafting the narrative architecture for genuine messaging, I always bring passion, collaboration and open-mindedness to the table. Let's take chances, ideate quickly and have the playground to ourselves.
